name: No Rest For The Wicked (itch.io)
description:
No Rest For The Wicked
Fight your way through hordes of slugs (they only come out in the day).Find resources inside crates to survive.Get to the door (one of four corners) before you loose your mind.Check your phone to see day/night phase time left.You'll find soon enough that there is no rest for the wicked...
Instructions
Use keyboard and mouse to play.
Move: WASD keys
Run: Left shift pressed
Aim: Move mouse
Toggle mode (interaction/battle): Right Click
Melee Attack: In battle mode -> Middle Mouse click
Fire Weapon: In battle mode -> Left Mouse Click
Get Item: In interaction mode -> Left Mouse Click
Click on the bag to open inventory and use items
Click on the phone to check day/night phase time left
Change weapon: 1,2,3,4 or Scroll Wheel
Additional Notes
For a better experience, download the Windows executable version (quit game by pressing Alt + F4).
This is just a technical demo for some mechanics and dynamics that I had running in my head for a while. There is no lore to it or even a basic story.
I hope you enjoy it :D
